Musical-Djastiz: say; tell; declare; give information; SBJ tells IND that OBJ (fact; opinion; notion; sentence) is true; give information
tell; implore; command; SBJ tells IND to make OBJ (command; instruction) happen; instruct
ask; interrogate; SBJ asks IND OBJ (question)
knowledgeable; the quality of knowing a lot of things; SBJ knows a lot about OBJ
need (the subject must possess the direct object for the indirect object to be true)
listen-carefully (listen to and parse words, not just sounds)
deliver (move the direct object to the indirect object)
obtain (the direct object from the indirect object)
national; SBJ (national) identifies as part of OBJ (nation; tribe; clan; e.g. Kurdistan, Tibet)
citizen; SBJ (citizen) legally belongs to OBJ (state; sovereign; polity; e.g. India, The Vatican)
tempt; entice to something appealing but immoral; SBJ (tempter; temptress) encourages IND (temptee) to do OBJ (temptation)
air; atmosphere; nitrogen and oxygen and all that jazz
joint; a point at which two things come together
